price: Kwani! Ikiwa mtavumilia na mkamchamngu na hata maadui wakikutokeeni kwa ghafla, basi hapo Mola wenu Mlezi atakusaidieni kwa Malaika elfu tano wanao shambulia kwa nguvu.
arabic: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِن تَصۡبِرُواْ وَتَتَّقُواْ وَيَأۡتُوكُم مِّن فَوۡرِهِمۡ هَٰذَا يُمۡدِدۡكُمۡ رَبُّكُم بِخَمۡسَةِ ءَالَٰفٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ مُسَوِّمِينَ
footnotes: Ndio! Msaada huo unakutosheni. Na pindi mkivumilia vita, na mkashikilia uchamngu, na hata maadui zenu wakikutokeeni kwa ghafla, Mola wenu Mlezi atawaongeza hao Malaika mpaka wafike elfu tano ili kukupeni nguvu.wakikutokeeni kwa ghafla, Mola wenu Mlezi atawaongeza hao Malaika mpaka wafike elfu tano ili kukupeni nguvu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: balā in taṣbirū watattaqū wayatūkum min fawrihim hādhā yum'did'kum rabbukum bikhamsati ālāfin mina al-malāikati musawwimīna
